Literature.Title: A novel polycationic analogue of gratisin with antibiotic activity against both Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.
Literature.Author: Tamaki M, Kokuno M, Suzuki Y, Iwama M, Shindo M, Uchida Y, Uchida Y

Literature.Title: Syntheses of low-hemolytic antimicrobial gratisin peptides.
Literature.Author: Tamaki M, Kokuno M, Sasaki I, Suzuki Y, Iwama M, Saegusa K, Kikuchi Y, Shindo M, Kimura M, Uchida Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis IFO 3513(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 19213(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis IFO 12933(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus IFO 12732(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Escherichia coli IFO 12734(MIC=25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa IFO 3080(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis NBRC 3513(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis NBRC 12933(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NBRC 12732(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NBRC 3080(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli NBRC 12734(MIC=25µg/ml)
